properties.areaDesc: Avon Point to Willowick OH beyond 5 nm off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Avon Point to Willowick OH
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 17 at 2:18PM EST until January 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 knots with gusts up to 50 knots and
waves 6 to 11 feet expected.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from Avon Point to
Willowick OH and Lake Erie open waters from Avon Point to
Willowick OH.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility..
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
